# hello-go bootstrap — proof of work

## Summary

Go hello-world example runnable via `go run .` in examples/hello-go.

## Repo

- root: /home/spencer/git/human-execution-engine
- branch: feat/hello-go-bootstrap

## Commands

- (cd examples/hello-go && go run .)
- ./hee mark hello-go

## Output (captured)

```text
hello-go ✅ host=flippy ts=2026-02-03T08:24:32.249455567-06:00
```text

## Environment (captured)

- go version go1.18.1 linux/amd64

## hee

### sig

```text
HEE — Human Execution Engine

Core:
  hee help        show this
  hee mark <msg>  write timestamped evidence mark
  hee sig         print node signature
  hee card <name> show a card

Principle:
  small, proven, compounding steps
```text
